languages.text: "О-о-о-о, как бы тебе хотелось получить ответ на этот вопрос! Даже не знаю, что слаще — дать тебе честный ответ или оставить прозябать в неведении? Хм-м-м... посмотрим, как ты будешь вести себя, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка}".

traits.locale_text: "О-о-о-о, как бы тебе хотелось получить ответ на этот вопрос! Даже не знаю, что слаще — дать тебе честный ответ или оставить прозябать в неведении? Хм-м-м... посмотрим, как ты будешь вести себя, {mf|мальчик|девочка}".
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."
languages.original_text: "О-о-о-о, как бы тебе хотелось получить ответ на этот вопрос! Даже не знаю, что слаще — дать тебе честный ответ или оставить прозябать в неведении? Хм-м-м... посмотрим, как ты будешь вести себя, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка}".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “噢，你真的很想知道这个问题的答案，是吧！我不知道怎么做才会更令我满意。是老老实实地告诉你答案？还是任由你在无知中煎熬？嗯……我们来看看你会怎么做吧，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: “噢，你真的很想知道这个问题的答案，是吧！我不知道怎么做才会更令我满意。是老老实实地告诉你答案？还是任由你在无知中煎熬？嗯……我们来看看你会怎么做吧，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}。”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «Oh, te encantaría saberlo, ¿verdad? No sé qué sería más exquisito, responderte de verdad o dejar que te reconcoma la ignorancia. Mmm... dependerá de cómo te portes, muchach{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, te encantaría saberlo, ¿verdad? No sé qué sería más exquisito, responderte de verdad o dejar que te reconcoma la ignorancia. Mmm... dependerá de cómo te portes, muchach{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「ああ、その答えを知りたいのね？正直に答えてあげるのと、無知なままぐずぐずしているのを放っておくのと…どっちがより満足できるのかしらね。ふむ…あなたの行動を見守らせてもらおうかしら、かわいい子」
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、その答えを知りたいのね？正直に答えてあげるのと、無知なままぐずぐずしているのを放っておくのと…どっちがより満足できるのかしらね。ふむ…あなたの行動を見守らせてもらおうかしら、かわいい子」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Oh, das wüsstest du gerne, nicht wahr? Ich weiß nicht einmal was befriedigender wäre ... dir eine ehrliche Antwort zu geben oder dich in deiner Unwissenheit schmoren zu lassen. Hmm ... wir werden ja sehen, wie du dich schlägst, {mf|kleiner Junge|kleines Mädchen}."
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das wüsstest du gerne, nicht wahr? Ich weiß nicht einmal was befriedigender wäre ... dir eine ehrliche Antwort zu geben oder dich in deiner Unwissenheit schmoren zu lassen. Hmm ... wir werden ja sehen, wie du dich schlägst, {mf|kleiner Junge|kleines Mädchen}.
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Vous aimeriez bien le savoir, n'est-ce pas ? Je ne sais pas ce qui me ferait le plus plaisir... vous répondre franchement ou vous laisser croupir dans votre ignorance crasse. Hmm... Tout dépendra de votre comportement, {mf|cher petit morveux|chère petite morveuse}. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aimeriez bien le savoir, n'est-ce pas ? Je ne sais pas ce qui me ferait le plus plaisir... vous répondre franchement ou vous laisser croupir dans votre ignorance crasse. Hmm... Tout dépendra de votre comportement, {mf|cher petit morveux|chère petite morveuse}. »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Ha, bu sorunun cevabını öğrenmek istemezsin! Hangisinin daha keyifli olacağını ben bile kestiremiyorum. Sana dürüst bir yanıt mı versem yoksa seni cahilliğinle çürümeye mi bıraksam? Hımm... Nasıl davranacağını göreceğiz ufaklık."
languages.original_text: "Oh, wouldn't you like to know the answer to that question! I don't even know which would be more satisfying — to give you an honest answer or leave you to languish in your ignorance. Hmm... we'll see how you conduct yourself, little {mf|boy|girl}."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, bu sorunun cevabını öğrenmek istemezsin! Hangisinin daha keyifli olacağını ben bile kestiremiyorum. Sana dürüst bir yanıt mı versem yoksa seni cahilliğinle çürümeye mi bıraksam? Hımm... Nasıl davranacağını göreceğiz ufaklık."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
